caption: A group of people are having a discussion indoors. Next, they get into a car and drive on the road. In a meeting room, a group of people are working at a table. Two people are standing in front of a television discussing. The car drives onto an elevated bridge. A person points at a map on the wall. In an underground garage, several people bring in boxes and place them in the car's trunk. In a control room, a man shouts into a microphone. Several police cars surround the escaping vehicles. The police are chasing the suspects with their guns drawn. During the escape, a car crashes into a wall. A white-haired man quickly opens the door and flees. The scene returns to an office.
